document_data.name: Enom Tobun
document_data.mainbody: '''Enom Tobun''' was a teamster just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Personality: Enom loved telling stories, not caring for the truthfulness of them. If someone question this, he grew resentful and vindictive. On the other hand, he was a wonderful traveling companion.
document_data.History:
Enom had driven caravans across all [[Faerun]], from [[Waterdeep]] to [[Calimport]] and from [[Baldur's Gate]] to [[Hillsfar]].

At the start of the [[Tyranny of Dragons]] in [[1489 DR|1489]], Enom acted as teamster to a great caravan, which unknown to him was full of [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
